export var questionObj={"Qtext":"
 
What number should be subtracted from each of the numbers \(9 \), \(18 \), and \(24 \) to make the reminders be in continued proportion.
\newline

","Steps":[{"id":"s1","n_params":0,"step_txt":"Lets suppose that the required number is $z $.

Since the numbers $9 - z $, $18 - z $, $24 - z $, are in proportion, we have
\[
	\frac{9 - z }{18 - z } = \frac{18 - z }{24 - z }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow (9 - z )(24 - z ) = (18 - z )(18 - z )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 216 - z (33 ) + z ^2 = 324 - z (36 ) + z ^2
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z (36 - 33 ) = 324 - 216 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{324 - 216 }{36 - 33 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{108 }{3 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{36 }{1 }
\]
\newline "}]};export var resp=[{"data":[],"text":""}];

sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
What number should be subtracted from each of the numbers \(9 \), \(18 \), and \(24 \) to make the reminders be in continued proportion.
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "Lets suppose that the required number is $z $.

Since the numbers $9 - z $, $18 - z $, $24 - z $, are in proportion, we have
\[
	\frac{9 - z }{18 - z } = \frac{18 - z }{24 - z }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow (9 - z )(24 - z ) = (18 - z )(18 - z )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 216 - z (33 ) + z ^2 = 324 - z (36 ) + z ^2
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z (36 - 33 ) = 324 - 216 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{324 - 216 }{36 - 33 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{108 }{3 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{36 }{1 }
\]
\newline "}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": ""}]
